org.bytemechanics.config.manager

Interface ConfigManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigManagerImpl

    public interface ConfigManager
    Config Manager service, there are several things to take in account: Overwrited lists can have unexpected behaviours please convert it to maps if you want to override any attribute, otherwise you need to take in account: If you are overriding with yaml files include all its elements changing only what you want to change If you change the size of a list from properties origin the helper field length should no be correct
    Author:
    afarre

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void load()
      Reads all configured locations and populate into System properties
      Stream<Config> read(URI _location)
      Reads the uri location if possible returning a configuration stream
      Stream<Config> stream()
      Reads all configured locations and return as stream
      void write(URI _location, Stream<Config> _config)
      Utility method to update configuration locations when possible

    • Method Detail

      • read

        Stream<Config> read(URI _location)
        Reads the uri location if possible returning a configuration stream
        Parameters:
        _location - location where read the configuration
        Returns:
        Stream of configurations or an empty stream
        Throws:
        UnreadableConfigLocation - if the location can not be readed
        UnsupportedConfigLocationFormat - if the format of the location is not supported
        UnsupportedConfigLocationScheme - if the scheme of the location is not supported (location type)

      • write

        void write(URI _location,
           Stream<Config> _config)
        Utility method to update configuration locations when possible
        Parameters:
        _location - location to update/create configuration
        _config - stream of config files to write
        Throws:
        UnwritableConfigLocation - when for any reason the configuration can not be writen
        UnsupportedConfigLocationFormat - if the format of the location is not supported
        UnsupportedConfigLocationScheme - if the scheme of the location is not supported (location type)
        UnsupportedOperationException - if write operation is not supported by the location format and/or scheme

      • stream

        Stream<Config> stream()
        Reads all configured locations and return as stream
        Returns:
        Stream of configurations or an empty stream
        Throws:
        UnreadableConfigLocation - if the location can not be readed
        UnsupportedConfigLocationFormat - if the format of the location is not supported
        UnsupportedConfigLocationScheme - if the scheme of the location is not supported (location type)

      • load

        void load()
        Reads all configured locations and populate into System properties
        Throws:
        UnreadableConfigLocation - if the location can not be readed
        UnsupportedConfigLocationFormat - if the format of the location is not supported
        UnsupportedConfigLocationScheme - if the scheme of the location is not supported (location type)
